title: Five steps to better farm living
creator_credit: Evelyn Cherry and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Agricultural economist R.R. Hare discusses the importance of a good farm management. Profitable farming depends upon effective land use, good livestock management, effective use of labor, efficient use of capital and optimum business size. Victory Bonds are recommended as a way of saving money to make farm improvements following the end of World War II.
